trans-unit.source: Runs a child activity iteratively as long as a certain condition is true.
trans-unit.target: Executa uma atividade filha iterativamente desde que uma determinada condição seja verdadeira.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WhileActivity> is a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity>, meaning the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WhileActivity> can contain other activities.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WhileActivity> é um <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity>, o que significa o <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WhileActivity> pode conter outras atividades.

trans-unit.source: Before each iteration, the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WhileActivity.Condition%2A> property is evaluated.
trans-unit.target: Antes de cada iteração, o <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WhileActivity.Condition%2A> propriedade é avaliada.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WhileActivity.Condition%2A> property evaluates to `false`, the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WhileActivity> immediately finishes.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WhileActivity.Condition%2A> propriedade for avaliada como `false`, o <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WhileActivity> concluída imediatamente.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to create a new instance of the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WhileActivity> class and add the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ParallelActivity> class to the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WhileActivity> class.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como criar uma nova instância do <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WhileActivity> classe e adicione o <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ParallelActivity> de classe para o <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WhileActivity> classe.

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of the WhileAndParallel SDK Sample from the WhileAndParallelWorkflow.Designer.cs file.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo de código é parte do exemplo WhileAndParallel SDK do arquivo WhileAndParallelWorkflow.Designer.cs.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Using While and Parallel](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/776a25cc-6aed-4754-b680-996213831b84).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [usando enquanto e paralelo](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/776a25cc-6aed-4754-b680-996213831b84).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.WhileActivity" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.WhileActivity" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.WhileActivity" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.WhileActivity" />.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to create a new instance of the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WhileActivity> class and add the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ParallelActivity> class to the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WhileActivity> class.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como criar uma nova instância do <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WhileActivity> classe e adicione o <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ParallelActivity> de classe para o <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WhileActivity> classe.

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of the WhileAndParallel SDK Sample from the WhileAndParallelWorkflow.Designer.cs file.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo de código é parte do exemplo WhileAndParallel SDK do arquivo WhileAndParallelWorkflow.Designer.cs.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Using While and Parallel](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/776a25cc-6aed-4754-b680-996213831b84).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [usando enquanto e paralelo](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/776a25cc-6aed-4754-b680-996213831b84).

trans-unit.source: The user-defined name of the activity.
trans-unit.target: O nome da atividade definido pelo usuário.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.WhileActivity" /> class using the name of the activity.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.WhileActivity" /> usando o nome da atividade.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a condition that determines whether the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.WhileActivity" /> should run or finish.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define uma condição que determina se a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.WhileActivity" /> deve ser executada ou finalizada.

trans-unit.source: When the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition" /> property evaluates to <see langword="true" />, the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.WhileActivity" /> continues to run.
trans-unit.target: Quando o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition" /> propriedade for avaliada como <see langword="true" />, o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.WhileActivity" /> continua a ser executado.

trans-unit.source: When the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition" /> evaluates to <see langword="false" />, the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.WhileActivity" /> finishes.
trans-unit.target: Quando o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition" /> é avaliada como <see langword="false" />, o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.WhileActivity" /> for concluída.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to create a new instance of the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WhileActivity> class, add the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ParallelActivity> class to the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WhileActivity> class, and set the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WhileActivity.Condition%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como criar uma nova instância do <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WhileActivity> de classe, adicione o <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ParallelActivity> de classe para o <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WhileActivity> de classe e defina o <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WhileActivity.Condition%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Represents the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" /> that targets the <see cref="P:System.Workflow.Activities.WhileActivity.Condition" /> property.
trans-unit.target: Representa o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" /> que tem como destino a propriedade <see cref="P:System.Workflow.Activities.WhileActivity.Condition" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the dynamic child activities in the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.WhileActivity" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém as atividades filhas dinâmicas na <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.WhileActivity" />.

trans-unit.source: The dynamic child activities in the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.WhileActivity" />.
trans-unit.target: As atividades filho dinâmico a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.WhileActivity" />.

trans-unit.source: The object that raised the event.
trans-unit.target: O objeto que gerencie o evento.

trans-unit.source: The previously typed event arguments.
trans-unit.target: Os argumentos do evento com tipo anterior.

trans-unit.source: Defines the processing procedure when the subscribed-to event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Define o procedimento de processamento quando o evento subscribed-to ocorre.
